pr_title: GEODE-8123: Allow Redis to start on a random port

timeline.bodyText:
Shouldn't the allowed values now be -1..65535?
Also seems like you should add a line to the description saying what -1 means.
timeline.author: dschneider-pivotal
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1920,7 +1920,7 @@ * clients to connect and store data in GemFire distributed system. see {@code GeodeRedisServer} * for other configuration options. *

- * Default: "0" disables GemFireMemcachedServer + * Default: "0" disables {@code GeodeRedisServer} *

* Allowed values: 0..65535

replies.bodyText: Yes. I updated the comment to mention -1
replies.author: jdeppe-pivotal

timeline.message:
Allow for the Redis server to start on a random port

- Specify "redis-port" with a value of -1

Authored-by: Jens Deppe <jdeppe@vmware.com>

Introduce GeodeRedisServerRule for use in tests

- This rule takes advantage of the Redis server starting on a random
  port.

Authored-by: Jens Deppe <jdeppe@vmware.com>

Introduce GeodeRedisServerRule for use in tests

- This rule takes advantage of the Redis server starting on a random
  port.

Authored-by: Jens Deppe <jdeppe@vmware.com>
